api_list.name: genie_scam_detection
api_list.description:
Scam/Fraud Detection: This API is equipped with advanced NLP models that can accurately identify suspicious patterns and content commonly associated with scams and fraudulent activities. It helps users to detect phishing attempts, fraudulent offers, and other deceptive communications.


Use Cases:

Email Security: Email providers and organizations can utilize this API to enhance email security.
Chat and Messaging Platforms: Chat applications and messaging platforms can integrate this API to scan and flag suspicious messages, promoting trust and safety within their user communities.
Social Media Moderation: Social media platforms can utilize the API to detect and remove fraudulent content, such as scam advertisements and phishing links.
